page.title: 18GAMES
page.content: TALISMAN IS A ROLE PLAYING FANTASY BOARD GAME.YOU CAN BE ONE OUT OF 14 PEOPLE .THE AIM OF THE GAME IS TO REACH THE CENTRE OF THE BOARD WITH A TALISMAN AND BE THE LAST PERSON ON THE BOARD.YOU CAN FIND MAGIC OBJECTS LIKE A WAND,SWORD,BELT AND A RING.BUT SOMETIMES YOU MEET MONSTERS.THE TWO MOST POWERFUL MONSTERS ARE THE DRAGON AND DEMON.THERE ARE SEVERAL STRANGERS SOME OF THEM WILL GIVE YOU SPELLS OR GOLD BUT OTHERS WILL TURN YOU INTO A TOAD.YOU CAN ALSO HAVE FOLLOWERS WHO WILL HELP YOU IF YOU ARE IN DANGER.THERE ARE TWO BAD FOLLOWERS WHO DO NOT HELP YOU AT ALL.THEY ARE THE HAG AND POLTERGEIST.YOU HAVE BAGS OF GOLD WHICH YOU USE TO BUY THINGS.THERE ARE A FEW SPACES WHERE YOU ROLL THE DIE TO SEE WHAT HAPPENS TO YOU.IN THIS GAME YOU CAN BE GOOD,EVIL OR NEUTRAL.
